text: Paul Edward Valentine Giamatti (born June 6, 1967) is an American Actor and Producer. He played John Adams in John Adams, and William Hill in Saving Private Ryan. His first movie was Private Parts. In 2024, he was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in The Holdovers. Giamatti was born in New Haven, Connecticut and studied at Yale University. He was briefly married to Elizabeth Cohen in 1997.
